section.p: Characteristics of a patient's cardiac arrest

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11420 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.27"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11130)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10138)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD"/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Cause (CONF:10941)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] informant such that it (CONF:10144)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF" (CONF:10158)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity such that it (CONF:11071)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:10159)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestWitnessRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.11 DYNAMIC (CONF:10160)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.04

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10145)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10162)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10161)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10146)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10169)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10168)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10147)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10181)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10148)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10187)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10186)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Destination Rhythm (CONF:10188)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:11072)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10177)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Arrest Rhythm (CONF:10178)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:11377)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10151)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10149)
contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Timing

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:11332)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:11333)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Outcome (CONF:11334)
contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11130)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10138)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD"/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Cause (CONF:10941)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] informant such that it (CONF:10144)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10168)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10181)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Arrest Rhythm (CONF:10178)

contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Timing

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.27"/> <code code="ASSERTION" displayName="ASSERTION"/> <effectiveTime/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="410429000" displayName="cardiac arrest"/> <informant typeCode="INF"> <relatedEntity classCode="AGNT"> <code/> </relatedEntity> </informant> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.124"/> <code code="67503-3" displayName="Cardiac arrest cause NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.128"/> <code code="67513-2" displayName="Return of spontaneous circulation NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.129"/> <code code="67519-9" displayName="Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.127"/> <code code="67512-4" displayName="First monitored rhythm NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.184"/> <code code="77152-7" displayName="Cardiac arrest event outcome"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
